channel.title: Need some ideas
channel.description:
Ok, i lost my job not 20 mins ago.
After working there for 2 months, a previous staff member came back asking for a job, and the business went with the experienced person, rather than the nooby who was still learning.
So, i cant argue with there desicion, but im still mad about it.
now, it will probably take me about 2 weeks or so to find a good job again. In that time, ide like to try and make a business, since owning a business is better than working.
I have knolodge of programming can put a computer together (not a hardware man though, barely know what RAM is) Like animals Like children Good with numbers Love driving Job i just lost was loaning money to people Love the cold, hate the hot Dont really like confrontation If im in charge of something, i make it my mission to do it right, thats why i wanna run a business
So, those are a basic set of information about me. The ideas dont need to follow those though.
So, any ideas of what kind of business i can start? Also, i have $2,500 in the bank which i can use to start from

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:20, topic:255364”][quote author=jme link=topic=337423.msg2621151#msg2621151 date=1231384712]

How can they fire you because of that?

That would be illegal here.
[/quote]No it wouldn’t… If I remember, you’re in Canada right? We have a 3 month probation period where they can fire you for whatever reason they want.

You can either sue them or file a claim with the Ministry of Labour for wrongful dismissal. Employers can get in a lot of shit, and you can get a lot of money.

Or your old job back and a pay raise. ;)[/quote]

The relationship between you and your boss is fucked up by then, so I’d go for a shitload of money.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:19, topic:255364”]At least in the uk, you don’t qualify to appeal based on unfair dismissal until you’ve been in the job for one year (unless certain factors apply, such as the employer violating your employment rights blah blah).

For wrongful dismissal they have to have breached contract.[/quote]

in the UK most contracts come with a 6 month probation period written in. All mine, forever, have had it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:18, topic:255364”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=337423.msg2621072#msg2621072 date=1231381407]

How can they fire you because of that?

That would be illegal here.
[/quote]No it wouldn’t… If I remember, you’re in Canada right? We have a 3 month probation period where they can fire you for whatever reason they want.

You can either sue them or file a claim with the Ministry of Labour for wrongful dismissal. Employers can get in a lot of shit, and you can get a lot of money. [/quote]

Or your old job back and a pay raise.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

At least in the uk, you don’t qualify to appeal based on unfair dismissal until you’ve been in the job for one year (unless certain factors apply, such as the employer violating your employment rights blah blah).

For wrongful dismissal they have to have breached contract.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:14, topic:255364”][quote author=jme link=topic=337423.msg2620268#msg2620268 date=1231345430]
How can they fire you because of that?

That would be illegal here.
[/quote]No it wouldn’t… If I remember, you’re in Canada right? We have a 3 month probation period where they can fire you for whatever reason they want.[/quote]

You can either sue them or file a claim with the Ministry of Labour for wrongful dismissal. Employers can get in a lot of shit, and you can get a lot of money.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Hire someone you know to build a robotic child that you’ll program to make snowcones.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Cab buisness, if you live near a place that there are lots of tourists then it would be great, give your info to a few hotels and then you should be called, also then you can start hiring…maybe after sometime.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

Local Computer repair bro. If you live in a place like I do, no one knows jack shit about computers, or what a motherboard is, or what ram is. Fix it for them, but make sure everything is cheaper than your local Best Buy, etc.

ex. (installing ram, graphics card, cleaning computers of viruses)

If you don’t know how to install ram or a graphics card, it is easy and takes about 5 minutes to learn. People at our Staples get paid fifty dollars to install ram and most computer stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:255364”]How can they fire you because of that?

That would be illegal here.[/quote]No it wouldn’t… If I remember, you’re in Canada right? We have a 3 month probation period where they can fire you for whatever reason they want.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Go to the appropriate ombudsman and lodge a complaint.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

OnlyOneRule is right. But some people have ‘unlimited’ contracts, which means that they can’t be fired that easily like someone that’s close to finishing his 1 year contract.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

If I’d get fired, I’d have to work at the same place for about 3 months before actually losing my job. And if they don’t have work for me, but I do have a contract that says I work X hours a week, they have to pay me for doing nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Be a cabby.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:8, topic:255364”][quote author=jme link=topic=337423.msg2620268#msg2620268 date=1231345430]
How can they fire you because of that?

That would be illegal here.
[/quote]In the United States, you don’t need a reason. Most contracts have the “You may be terminated with or without reason, notice, etc.”[/quote]Shit country is shit. At least here you have rights.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Rent a truck, advertise in the yellow pages. Help people move houses. You’d start off small like that. Eventually you’d hire your own workers, buy your own truck, get your own logo etc…

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:255364”]How can they fire you because of that?

they worded it as ‘There is no longer any work here for you’
but i talked with the manager, and he explained what really happened

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

Join the club, i want to start a business too, but i don’t have any ideas.

I made a simple website a week ago , so i’m just starting small and maybe it’ll grow to something big.

the Porn idea has crossed my mind a few times already and if anyone would like to work on this or something else then just send me a pm.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:1, topic:255371”]You could operate a pornographic website. Build your own server to save money, use that programming knowledge of yours to quickly learn PHP and then build the site.[/quote]he could also use his girlfriend as a model
